intro: Calculate your estimated California state income tax for 2025 based on progressive tax brackets.

sections.howItWorks: California uses a progressive tax system with multiple income brackets. This calculator estimates your tax based on your taxable income.
sections.examples: Example: Someone earning $70,000 in California might fall into multiple tax brackets. This calculator breaks down your taxes across each bracket.
sections.limitations: This tool does not take into account itemized deductions, credits, or local taxes. Always verify tax rules with the California Franchise Tax Board.

faq.q: Does California have progressive income tax?
faq.a: Yes. California uses one of the most progressive tax systems in the United States with multiple income brackets.
Yes, California taxes capital gains as regular income.
